topic.title: Review
topic.section:
The Review Page is a record of editorial process, including sections of Submission, Abstract Review/Paper Review, Reviewer, Director Decision, Complete, and Layout.

The Track Director's abilities and responsibilities mirror the Director's responsibilities laid out {help_topic key="editorial.directorsRole.reviewPage" text="here"} exactly. The only difference between a Director and a Track Director is that a Track Director is not authorized to act on a submission assigned to them one way or another.
